meanings.definition: The masseters are the muscles at the side of the jaw that are used for chewing.
meanings.sent1: When I eat, my masseters work hard to help me chew my food.
meanings.sent2: Dentists often check the health of the masseters during a routine check-up.
meanings.sent3: The masseters must be tired from all the chewing I did at the picnic!
meanings.sent4: Her jaw clenched so tightly, it felt like her masseters were made of steel.
meanings.sent5: The powerful masseters of the lion effortlessly crushed the bones of its prey.

meanings.definition: The masseters can become tense and sore from clenching or grinding the teeth.
meanings.sent1: After a stressful day, I could feel my masseters getting tight and uncomfortable.
meanings.sent2: Athletes sometimes experience pain in their masseters due to excessive teeth grinding.
meanings.sent3: I never knew my masseters could hold so much tension until I tried to relax them.
meanings.sent4: The tension in her masseters mirrored the stress she felt in her mind.
meanings.sent5: The throbbing pain in his masseters made it hard for him to enjoy his meal.
